titles.title: A bill to permanently extend the current marginal tax rates.
A bill to permanently extend the current marginal tax rates.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 427.

bill.summary: Makes permanent the reductions in individual income tax rates enacted by the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001.
